Package it.polimi.ingsw.ps19.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ServerRemoteIntf
    Public interface for RMI on server manager
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Constants
    This class collects all the constants (final values) of the programs which are used by more than one class
    GameFactory
    Class the creates a new game
    Mutex
    Class that implements a simple mutex;
    RMIServer
    Implementation of server by RMI
    ServerManager
    Main class of the server manages socket connections.
    StopperThread
    reads server input and waits for stop;
    TimerThread
    This class works as a timer for the waiting room When the timer runs out the threads check weather the first players have changed, if not it begins a new game;
    WaitingRoom
    This static class (class with only static method) collects the users requiring to play and starts a new game when there are the conditions to do so;
